name: Jinni
description:
End Phase: Your active character is healed for 2 HP and gains 1 Energy.
When healing a character with no more than 6 HP, heal +1. The amount of Energy gained by characters with no Energy increased by 1 when Energy is gained.
Usage(s): 2
